DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: CALL MGRTD_MAPPING_PRODUCT_VERSION({0},{1},{2},{3},{4})

SELECT MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, (SELECT PROD_MSTR.PROD_NM from PROD_MSTR where PROD_MSTR.PROD_SYS_ID = MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID) AS PRODUCT_NAME, (SELECT ITEM.CD_DESC_TXT from PROD_MSTR, ITEM where PROD_MSTR.PROD_SYS_ID = MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID AND ITEM.PRMRY_CD = PROD_MSTR.PROD_FMLY_NM AND ITEM.CTLG_ID = '1937' )AS PRODUCT_FAMITY,MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR,MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID (+) AND MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0}
select MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID from MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR where LGCY_SRC_SYS_NM = {0} and LGCY_STRCTR_NM = {1} and EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID = {2}
SELECT EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = {0}

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR (MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, LGCY_SRC_SYS_NM, LGCY_STRCTR_NM, EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID, LOCK_STTS_FLAG, LAST_CHNGD_USER, LAST_CHNGD_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_MSTR SET EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID = ? WHERE MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = ?
delete from TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG where MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT m.prod_rule_sys_id, pr.gnrtd_rule_id, r.rule_id, r.rule_shrt_desc, rt.rule_typ_desc, pr.rule_pva, r.rule_grp_ind, m.rule_ovrd_val FROM mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn m, prod_rule_assn pr, rule r, rule_type rt WHERE m.prod_rule_sys_id = pr.prod_rule_sys_id AND pr.rule_id = r.rule_id AND rt.rule_typ_cd = r.rule_typ_cd AND m.wpd_del_flg = 'N' AND m.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} -- AND rt.rule_typ_desc = {1} AND pr.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ( {1} ) ORDER BY UPPER (r.rule_id) ASC, UPPER(r.rule_shrt_desc) ASC

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn (mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, prod_rule_sys_id, rule_ovrd_val, wpd_del_flg, lst_chg_tms, lst_chg_usr, creatd_tm_stmp, creatd_user_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn SET wpd_del_flg = ? WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id =? AND prod_rule_sys_id = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT m.prod_rule_sys_id, m.rule_ovrd_val FROM mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn m

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn SET rule_ovrd_val = ? , lst_chg_tms = ?, lst_chg_usr = ? --creatd_tm_stmp = ?, creatd_user_id = ? WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = ? AND prod_rule_sys_id = ?
delete from MGRTD_CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN where MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, PROD_SYS_ID, trim(RULE_ID), trim(GNRTD_RULE_ID), RULE_OVRD_VAL FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND WPD_DEL_FLG != 'Y'
SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, PROD_SYS_ID, trim(RULE_ID), trim(GNRTD_RULE_ID), RULE_OVRD_VAL FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND WPD_DEL_FLG != 'Y' AND PROD_RULE_SYS_ID not {1}

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT trim(B.RULE_ID), trim(B.RULE_TYP_CD), trim(B.RULE_GRP_IND) FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN A, RULE B WHERE A.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND trim(B.RULE_ID) = trim(A.RULE_ID) AND A.WPD_DEL_FLG != 'Y' AND B.WPD_DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND trim(B.RULE_TYP_CD) = 'ADJUD'

SELECT trim(B.RULE_ID), trim(B.RULE_TYP_CD), trim(B.RULE_GRP_IND) FROM GRP_RULE A, RULE B WHERE trim(A.GRP_RULE_ID) = trim({0}) AND trim(A.RULE_ID) = trim(B.RULE_ID) AND A.WPD_DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND B.WPD_DEL_FLAG != 'Y' AND trim(B.RULE_TYP_CD) = 'ADJUD'

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT RULE_SQNC_NBR, trim(RULE_ID), trim(SERIVCE_CD), trim(SRVC_CLS_LOW), trim(SRVC_CLS_HIGH), trim(LMT_CLS_LOW), trim(LMT_CLS_HIGH), trim(PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD) FROM RULE_DAT WHERE trim(RULE_ID) = trim({0})

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: CALL CONFIRM_LINEMAPPINGS({0},{1},{2},{3},{4})

SELECT A.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, A.LGCY_VRBL_ID, A.LGCY_VRBL_DTL FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG A, MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL B WHERE A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID not in (SELECT distinct BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID from MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL where PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID={2}) and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER(+) AND A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = {1}

SELECT A.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, A.LGCY_VRBL_ID, A.LGCY_VRBL_DTL FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG A,MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL B WHERE A.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID in (SELECT distinct BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID from MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL where PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID={2}) and A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER(+) AND A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = {1}

DELETE FROM MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL WHERE PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER = ? AND BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG.LGCY_VRBL_ID from TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG where TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = (select MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0}) union select MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL.LGCY_VRBL_ID from MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL where PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID =(select MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR where MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {1})

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select PRMRY_CD from ITEM where CTLG_ID = {0} and PRMRY_CD = {1}

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,LAST_ACSD_PAGE, STEP_NBR_CMPLTD, LAST_CHNGD_USER, LAST_CHNGD_TMS FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT b.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, b.step_nbr_cmpltd, b.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND b.step_nbr_cmpltd < 9 AND a.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0}

SELECT mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_efctv_dt FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id IN ( SELECT b.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND a.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0} MINUS SELECT DISTINCT c.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_prcg_info c WHERE c.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id IN ( SELECT b.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND a.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0}))

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR SET LAST_ACSD_PAGE = ?, STEP_NBR_CMPLTD = ?, LAST_CHNGD_USER = ?, LAST_CHNGD_TMS = ? WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

UPDATE mgrtd_cntrct_mstr SET last_acsd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = ?, last_chngd_user = ?, last_chngd_tms = ? WHERE mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = (SELECT mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = ?)

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, i.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, H.BNFT_ID_NM, f.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA,c.LGCY_VRBL_ID,d.LGCY_VRBL_ID from MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR a, --BNFT_LINE_OVRD_VAL b PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD b, TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG c, MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL d, BLN_BNFT_LINE e, BLVL_BNFT_LVL f, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR g, BMST_BNFT_MSTR h, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR i where a.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and a.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID = b.PROD_SYS_ID --and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'product' and b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = c.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and c.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = a.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and c.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER and d.PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = a.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID and c.LGCY_VRBL_ID != d.LGCY_VRBL_ID and e.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = c.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = f.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and f.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = g.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and g.BNFT_SYS_ID = h.BNFT_SYS_ID and i.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG ( MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, LGCY_VRBL_ID, MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID, LGCY_VRBL_DTL, LAST_CHNGD_USER, LAST_CHNGD_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG SET LGCY_VRBL_ID = ?, LGCY_VRBL_DTL = ?, LAST_CHNGD_USER = ?, LAST_CHNGD_TMS = ? WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM TEMP_CNTRCT_MAPG WHERE MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, PSBL_ANSWR_ID, PSBL_ANSWR, A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD A, QSTNR_MSTR B, PSBL_ANSWR C WHERE A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = B.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.RFRNC_ID = '0004' AND B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND A.OVRD_ANSWR_ID = C.PSBL_ANSWR_ID AND UPPER(C.PSBL_ANSWR) IN('CY','BY')

SELECT A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, PSBL_ANSWR_ID, PSBL_ANSWR, A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD A, QSTNR_MSTR B, PSBL_ANSWR C WHERE A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = B.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND A.PROD_SYS_ID= {0} AND B.RFRNC_ID = '0004' AND B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND A.OVRD_ANSWR_ID = C.PSBL_ANSWR_ID AND UPPER(C.PSBL_ANSWR) IN('CY','BY')

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, MGRT_NOTE_FLAG, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP, LAST_CHNGD_USER, LAST_CHNGD_TMS FROM LGCY_VAR_NOTE WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT D.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, D.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID, D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, D.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG, C.LGCY_VRBL_ID , E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR A, MGRTD_CNTRCT_MSTR B,MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_DTL C, LGCY_VAR_NOTE D , PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD E WHERE A.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID = B.MGRTD_CNTRCT_SYS_ID and B.MGRTD_PSTRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID = C.PROD_STRCTR_MAPG_SYS_ID and C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_IDENFITIER = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and C.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID and D.MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and D.MGRT_NOTE_FLAG = 'Y' AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND E.PROD_SYS_ID = B.EWPD_PROD_SYS_ID AND E.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = D.BNFT_LINE_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE MGRTD_CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_MSTR SET MGRTN_CMPLTD_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE MGRTD_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?
